name: Rini Smita Thakur
moreInfo: I have done image denoising using convolutional neural networks as part of my PhD dissertation work. I did a project on ECG signal denoising too. I am looking forward to explore deep learning applications in the area of image/ signal processing.

name: Rajeev Ranjan Dwivedi
moreInfo: I primarily work around Fairness in AI and debiasing AI-ML models. I also contribute to the field of transfer learning, machine unlearning and semantic segementation in vision. Apart from this, I am also interested in the field of LLMs and knowledge graphs.

name: Parinita Nema
moreInfo: My name is Parinita Nema. I am currently pursuing PhD. in the Data Science and Engineering Department at Indian Institute of Science Education and Research (IISER-B) with a UGC-JRF fellowship. I completed my Bachelor's and Master's degrees at the Vikram University, Ujjain in Computer Science. My Research areas of interest include Deep learning and Computer Vision.

name: Akanksha Singh
moreInfo: I joined VisDom lab in Julyâ€™23 under the supervision of Dr. Vinod K Kurmi. Broadly, I am interested in improving the efficacy and applicability of Unlearning Algorithms in Deep Learning models. To this end, I have been recently working on retrain-free approaches for increasing the upper bound of unlearning without necessitating any level of retraining. I am also interested in several ideas related to few-shot and zero-shot unlearning in the image domain.

name: Shivangi Rai
moreInfo: I primarily work around domain adaptation, generalization, and trustworthy AI. Mywork focuses on developing black-box adaptation techniques that enable robust, privacy-preserving learning across diverse and unseen environments.

name: Kunal Jangid
about: Reliable Tumor Delineation from Multi-Modal Medical Imaging for Precise Radiotherapy Planning
moreInfo: My research focuses on medical image analysis, specifically, tumor and organ-at-risk (OAR) segmentation for improving precision and clinical reliability under real deployment constraints. I have worked with frequency, fuzzy, uncertainty-based, foundation models and few-shot approaches. Beyond this, my interests extends to self-supervised, domain adaptation, generalization, 3D medical data analysis, and classification tasks..
